title: The impact of thickness-related grain boundary migration on hole concentration and mobility of p-type transparent conducting CuI films
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9072-9079
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00704B, Paper

This work highlights the importance of controlling grain boundary migration during film growth for hole transport in CuI films.
